  • Konstruktordetails

    • BoardBuilder

      public BoardBuilder()
      Constructs a new BoardBuilder with the specified number of rows and columns.

      This constructor initializes the game board's map as a 3D structure:

      • Outer list: Represents the rows of the board.
      • Middle list: Represents the columns of the board.
      • Inner list: Represents the tiles present at each board position.

  • Methodendetails

    • addWall

      public void addWall(int row, int col, int direction, String isOnBoard)
      Adds a wall to the specified tile on the game board at the given position and direction.

      This method checks if a WallTile already exists at the specified position. If it does, the wall direction is updated. Otherwise, a new WallTile is created and added to the tile list.

      Parameter:
      row - the row index of the tile where the wall is to be added
      col - the column index of the tile where the wall is to be added
      direction - the direction of the wall (0 = up, 1 = right, 2 = down, 3 = left)
      isOnBoard - a string indicating the status of the board for this tile
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified direction is not between 0 and 3
